name: Vegan No Bake Cookies
description: These Vegan No Bake Cookies are seriously addicting and a chocolate and peanut butter dream! So easy to make using simple ingredients only, it will be hard to make just one batch. A perfect Summer dessert since you donâ€™t have to turn on the oven!

recipeInstructions.text: Line a counter or two cookie sheets with parchment paper or wax paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a counter or two cookie sheets with parchment paper or wax paper.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sugar, cocoa, vegan butter and almond milk to a medium pot over low heat. Stir with a wooden spoon until the butter melts, then increase the heat to medium. Stir constantly and bring to a boil. Simmer for 1 minute exactly, then remove from heat and keep stirring for 30 seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the peanut butter and vanilla and stir until combined well. Stir in the oats until they are coated in the mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the mixture by about 2 tablespoons each onto prepared parchment/wax paper. You can leave them rounded at the top, or flatten them slightly if you prefer.

recipeInstructions.text: Allow to cool for 20-30 minutes before serving, until they are hardened. Serve and enjoy!
